title: What tilts you the most?
body:
Number 1: Someone feeds super hard and then goes AFK saying just go next.
Number 2: Someone feels that you stole their kill so they just steal every camp they possibly can from you putting you behind even though you should be super ahead cause you're fed.
Number 3: Riot doesn't ban people who ruin these games, but they will ban someone for saying that these players are throwing the game and are trolling.

What tilts you?
